column2: This event converts all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen into farmers if they are on your cores. Part 2 will spawn in 3 days, be sure to select this option FIRST.
This event converts all 100% unemployed farmers into labourers.
This event converts all 100% unemployed labourers into artisans.

This decision launches 3 events one after another that converts all non-core / non-accepted craftsmen that are on your cores ONLY into farmers. The second event will convert all 100% unemployed farmers into labourers (bypasses a glitch due to the limited power of pop configuring). The third will convert all 100% labourers into artisans (incase farming rgos were full and now labourers in a province with no labourer employment).
10 year reset before the decision can be taken again.
